pkreporter(8) System Manager's Manual pkreporter(8)

NAME

pkreporter — inventories and reports PlugIn state.

SYNOPSIS

pkreporter [-v]

DESCRIPTION

pkreporter runs once per week to inventory and report PlugIn state.

-v
Enable verbose output.

SEE ALSO

pluginkit(8) xpc(3)

BUGS

None yet.

HISTORY

pkreporter was first introduced in OS X 10.10.

6/22/14 Darwin
